Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Dallas Jones, a Biden campaign official, was arrested for voter fraud. There is no evidence or record of his arrest or charges.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that Jones was arrested for voter fraud when there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or credible source to back up the allegation of Jones' arrest.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Jones was involved in an illegal ballot-harvesting scheme without any proof or substantiation.
Exist alternative explanation: The false claim stems from unverified allegations made by Republicans in an unsuccessful lawsuit, suggesting that there may be alternative explanations for the claim.
